meanings.definition: Moving about aimlessly or without a fixed direction.
meanings.sent1: The cat's roving eyes followed the laser pointer around the room.
meanings.sent2: The roving clouds drifted lazily across the sky.
meanings.sent3: The roving toddler explored every corner of the playground.
meanings.sent4: Her roving imagination led her to create fantastical stories.
meanings.sent5: The roving spotlight illuminated different parts of the stage during the performance.

meanings.definition: A continuous strand of loosely twisted fibers.
meanings.sent1: She spun the roving into yarn for her knitting project.
meanings.sent2: The roving was soft and easy to work with.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten played with the roving, unraveling it all over the room.
meanings.sent4: The roving of colors in the fabric created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The weaver carefully selected the roving to create a unique tapestry.
